opening_hours_public_holidays: Saturday/ Sunday: Open first till last train from approx 07:00 – 23:30
comments_from_consortium:
There is an accessible toilet and a Changing Places Toilet provided at this station adjacent to each other.

There are ticket barriers at the station, if you are not travelling with us from the station please request use of the Changing Places facility and the supervisor will be able to offer you a key.

We have information to read and a form to sign at the station to enable us to monitor the use of the toilet and also ensure passenger safety when using the equipment.  Please allow a couple of minutes extra for the signature to be received before you need to use the facility
location: Platforms 2&3 accessed by a lift from the over bridge near the main entrance to the station.

name: Manor Farm Barns
opening_hours_mon_fri: 24 hour but car par has limited opening: 8.00am  – 7.00pm Mon – Sa
other_comments:
Open 24hrs, but car park outside is only open  8am  – 7pm Mon – Sat, and  9am  - 4pm sun & public holidays    - times vary according to the season – email to check times

The toilets were provided by the Bayfield estate as part of the attractions/shops in Manor Farm Barns and in the local area. There is hard standing to unload wheelchairs onto and a large parking area. 
On-site there are
Cley Spy – who sell binoculars an telescopes
Birdscapes Gallery
bird walk route through the Bayfield Estate can be a bit rough in places – not for heavy wheelchairs. 
Art Café which serves excellent food and hosts local artists and craft works for sale also
At another area along the road in the Bayfield Estate there is a seashell museum, aand at another area there is a Wildflower Centre and Antiques Emporium, with gifts and a flower shop.
See the Bayfield website – www.bayfieldhall.com 

Although this area and the businesses here are well worth a visit on their own, these toilets are available for anyone to use. If you’re in Holt, at the North Norfolk Coast or anywhere in the locality and need to use these facilities, you could come and use them.
location: Ground floor, purpose built as part of a suite of toilets
